data.title: Control Your Data

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: RAF Real Estate ("the Company") values the privacy of its customers and users of its website ("the Site"). This policy explains how the Company collects, uses, and shares personal data provided to us.
items: We collect personal data you provide when registering on the site or contacting us
We also collect data automatically collected when you visit the site
We use personal data to provide the services you request
We use automatically collected data to improve the site
We do not share personal data with any third party unless necessary to provide services
You have the right to access, update, correct, and delete your personal data

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.content: You are allowed to use the Site for legal purposes only. You are not allowed to upload, post, or send any illegal or inappropriate content.
items: The law protects the intellectual property rights of all content on the Site
You are not allowed to use, reproduce, or distribute any content without prior permission
We reserve the right to cancel your account or prevent you from accessing the Site at any time
These terms and conditions are subject to the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
Any disputes or disagreements will be resolved through arbitration in Saudi Arabia

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Integrity forms the core of our work, where we commit to honesty, ethical standards, self-monitoring, and building sustainable urban life

responsibility.title: Spirit of Responsibility
responsibility.description: We execute all our projects with high quality, precision, and transparency with careful attention to every detail

teamwork.title: Team Empowerment
teamwork.description: Supporting our teams and maintaining their trust is one of the most important reasons for our success and achieving our desired goals

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Sustainability is an essential part of our goals to develop sustainable communities with a long-term impact on the Kingdom's future

luxuryBathrooms.title: Luxury Bathrooms
luxuryBathrooms.description: We provide the finest ceramics and sanitary ware to ensure long-lasting quality

qualityDoors.title: Quality Doors
qualityDoors.description: Sound-insulating doors that provide high security and weather resistance

modernMajlis.title: Modern Majlis
modernMajlis.description: Ready-made or custom-designed majlis to meet client needs

luxuryBedrooms.title: Luxury Bedrooms
luxuryBedrooms.description: We focus on client comfort and privacy with the finest details

marbleDesign.title: Marble Design
marbleDesign.description: We choose innovative ideas in finishes to achieve luxury with quality

modernEntrance.title: Modern & Secure Entrance
modernEntrance.description: Nothing compares to the sense of security and luxury we provide to our clients

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be a leading company in real estate development and investment in the region, and to be a distinctive brand by providing high-quality real estate units that align with clients' lifestyle

goals.title: Goals
goals.goal1: Achieving change in the residential landscape in line with Vision 2030
goals.goal2: Providing residential units with modern designs and high-quality specifications that meet client needs
goals.goal3: Empowering human competencies and maintaining client trust and enthusiasm

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are?
whoWeAre.description: We are a real estate company working in real estate development with a comprehensive future concept. We aim to significantly change the residential landscape in the Kingdom by providing modern and harmonious residential services and urban environments. We focus on completing the best real estate projects that enjoy the highest quality standards and offering them at competitive prices. We support our projects with creative after-sales service solutions while paying attention to all details and preserving local customs and traditions

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Providing innovative solutions and distinguished services that meet client needs from project planning to giving the client an exceptional life experience. Our comprehensive development approach covers design, contract and procurement management, construction, and project commitment. We work with strength and honesty to provide our services through specialized work teams and integrated project management

development.title: Real Estate Development
development.description: Design and execute real estate projects with high quality

construction.title: Construction & Development
construction.description: We rely on modern technologies and skilled teams to manage projects efficiently

design.title: Design & Decoration
design.description: We provide modern interior and exterior designs using the latest methods

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: We use multiple marketing strategies (such as e-marketing) to market properties smoothly and effectively

design.title: Architectural Design
design.description: We draw inspiration from our rich heritage to create the most beautiful architectural designs. Every detail in our projects reflects the integration between past and present, from color selection to high-quality materials. We aim to combine the splendor of heritage and modern spirit innovation in every corner of the project

blog.title: Blog
blog.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest updates and exclusive content straight to your inbox.
blog.subscriptionSuccess: You have successfully subscribed to our newsletter.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: We present a collection of distinguished residential projects
projects.sectionDescription: Our business strategy is based on innovation and adaptability. Starting from Jeddah, we strategically focus our efforts on a diverse portfolio of projects, including residential, commercial, hospitality, retail, tourist destinations, and public projects, reflecting the multi-faceted nature of our brand.
projects.exploreProjectsOnMap: Explore our real estate projects across different locations
projects.clickOnMarkers: Click on markers to view project details

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: about us
about.description: At RAF Real Estate Development Company, we strive to provide innovative real estate solutions that combine quality and transparency to meet our customers' needs. Our company was founded on solid values and extensive experience in real estate development, to be your ideal partner in achieving your residential and investment dreams.

intro.content: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our website and services provided by RAF Real Estate Company. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.

usage.title: Use of Services
usage.content: Our services are provided for your personal and non-commercial use. You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of our services without express written permission from us.
